name: Ether (Lylouf)
description:
What is it ?

Ether is a toy project made during my second year at ICAN with 2 other students. It is about experimenting and creating chain reactions with the elements the system gives to the player.

I worked on it as both game designer and programmer

Gameplay

- Move with ZQSD

- Use SPACEBAR to Lock / Release the orb

- Use O to  enhance the orb

*note : 1-8 and P are meant as test tools,  you can still play with them though*
